abstract: A former investment banker and his small firm advised BP on a partnership with Rosneft of Russia to explore the Russian Arctic.
snippet: A former investment banker and his small firm advised BP on a partnership with Rosneft of Russia to explore the Russian Arctic.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — In the energy business, companies usually think big. But for a cross-border, multibillion-dollar deal, BP went small, selecting a little-known boutique firm as its sole adviser.

headline.main: BP Used Boutique Firm as Adviser on Partnership With Rosneft
